Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT
COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Authorizes the town of Brookhaven to alienate certain parklands for use as a recharge basin
Summary: Authorizes the town of Brookhaven, county of Suffolk to alienate certain parklands for use as a recharge basin and to dedicate other lands as replacement parklands.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the town of Brookhaven to alienate certain parklands for use as a recharge basin and to dedicate other lands as replacement parklands
